title: Are all the questions in universe answered? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is a great quote by Victor Hugo Martinsons: "Answers exist and questions are created." Think of it kind of like Jeopardy. You see the answer first. Or, if you ask how many planets there are in the universe; the answer was already there without you having to ask it. So yes, all questions are answered. However, we do not know what the answers are yet.
